Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable
--Motorizes grip for better looking sword animations
local Properties = { MaxShieldDurability = 400, ShieldRegenerationIncrement = 5, ShieldRegenerationTime = .5, Damage = 15 }
local Self = script
local Tool = Self.Parent
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local ShieldUI = Self:WaitForChild("ShieldUI"):Clone()
local Character,Humanoid,Player
local Game = game
local FindService,GetService = Game.FindService,Game.GetService local function ObtainService(ServiceName) return FindService(Game,ServiceName) or GetService(Game,ServiceName) end
local Services = { Players = ObtainService("Players"), Debris = ObtainService("Debris"), RunService = ObtainService("RunService") }
local Instant,Pairs,Type,sign,abs,wrap,Wait,Pcall,clamp,Delay = Instance.new,pairs,type,math.sign,math.abs,coroutine.wrap,wait,pcall,math.clamp,delay
local Cframe,Vec3 = CFrame.new,Vector3.new
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "creator", Value = player, } Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in Pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CastScripts(Duration,ScriptEntries) -- Could be used for ServerScripts, but we'll use LocalScripts in this case local LoggedScripts = {} -- Keeps track of the current scripts local Players = Services.Players:GetPlayers() for p=1,#Players do if Players[p] then for i=1,#ScriptEntries do if ScriptEntries[i] and ScriptEntries[i]:IsA("LocalScript") and Players[p]:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui")then local Clone = ScriptEntries[i]:Clone() Clone.Parent = Players[p]:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") -- The best spot to place it at Clone.Disabled = false LoggedScripts[#LoggedScripts+1] = Clone end end end end
local function Clean() --print("CLEANING") for s=1,#LoggedScripts do
if LoggedScripts[s] then --LoggedScripts[s]:Destroy() Services.Debris:AddItem(LoggedScripts[s],(Duration or 1)) end end LoggedScripts = {} -- Clear the Memory end
Clean()
end
local Deletables = {}
local Connections = {}
local Sounds = { Equip = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip"), Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash"), Lunge = Handle:WaitForChild("Lunge"), ShieldHit = Self:WaitForChild("ShieldHit") }
local Shield = Create'Part'{ Name = 'Shield'; Size = Vec3(2.8,1,3.8); Massless = true, Anchored = false, Locked = true, CanCollide = false; Create'SpecialMesh'{ Scale = Vec3(2, 1.2, 2); TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=73012518'; MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=73012430'; }; }
local ShieldHealth = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShieldHealth") or Create("DoubleConstrainedValue"){ Name = "ShieldHealth", MaxValue = Properties.MaxShieldDurability, MinValue = 0, Value = Properties.MaxShieldDurability, Parent = Tool } ShieldHealth.MaxValue = Properties.MaxShieldDurability ShieldHealth.MinValue = 0 ShieldHealth.Value = Properties.MaxShieldDurability
local EffectRemote = Tool:FindFirstChild("PlaySound") or Create("RemoteEvent"){ Name = "PlayEffect", Parent = Tool }
local EffectAction = { ["RapidSlash"] = { Ready = true, Cooldown = .45, Function = function() wrap(function() local DashEffect = Self:WaitForChild("DashEffect"):Clone() Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Character", Value = Character, Parent = DashEffect } CastScripts(.5,{DashEffect}) end)() Sounds.Lunge:Play() Wait(.1) Sounds.Slash:Play() Wait(.2) Sounds.Lunge:Play() end }, ["Slash"] = { Ready = true, Cooldown = 0, Function = function() Sounds.Slash:Play() end } }
function Equipped()
Character = Tool.Parent
Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
local RightLimb = (Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or Character:FindFirstChild("RightHand"))
local LeftLimb = (Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") or Character:FindFirstChild("LeftUpperArm"))
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not RightLimb or not RightLimb.Parent or not Handle or not Handle.Parent then return end
local ShieldClone = Shield:Clone() Deletables[#Deletables+1] = ShieldClone
local ShieldMotor = Create("Motor6D"){ --Name = "Shield", Part0 = LeftLimb, Part1 = ShieldClone, Parent = ShieldClone } Deletables[#Deletables+1] = ShieldMotor
local SwordMotor = Create("Motor6D"){ Name = "RightGrip_Motor", Part0 = RightLimb, Part1 = Handle
} Deletables[#Deletables+1] = SwordMotor
wrap(function() Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() local RightGrip = RightLimb:FindFirstChild("RightGrip")
if RightGrip then --Motor.C0 = RightGrip.C0 --Motor.C1 = RightGrip.C1 RightGrip.Part0 = nil RightGrip.Part1 = nil end
end)()
SwordMotor.Parent = RightLimb --ShieldMotor.Parent = ShieldClone ShieldClone.Parent = LeftLimb
Sounds.Equip:Play()
local CurrentHealth = Humanoid.Health local IgnoreDamage = false Connections[#Connections+1] = Humanoid.HealthChanged:Connect(function(NewHealth)
local Damage = (CurrentHealth - NewHealth)
if not IgnoreDamage and sign(Damage) > -1 then
local Remainder = (ShieldHealth.Value - Damage)
if sign(Damage) > -1 then ShieldHealth.Value = Remainder
local ShieldHitClone = Sounds.ShieldHit:Clone()
ShieldHitClone.Volume = clamp((Damage/Properties.MaxShieldDurability) * 5,.5,10) ShieldHitClone.Parent = ShieldClone --print(Damage) ShieldHitClone:Play() Delay(ShieldHitClone.TimeLength,function() if ShieldHitClone then ShieldHitClone:Destroy() end end)
end
--print(Remainder) IgnoreDamage = true Humanoid.Health = CurrentHealth if sign(Remainder) < 0 then Humanoid:TakeDamage(abs(Remainder)) end IgnoreDamage = false
end
CurrentHealth = Humanoid.Health --IgnoreDamage = false end)
--Display the current health of the shield to other players wrap(function()
local function ModifyUITransparency(Alpha) for _,obj in Pairs(ShieldUI:GetChildren()) do if obj:IsA("ImageLabel") then obj.ImageTransparency = Alpha elseif obj:IsA("TextLabel") then obj.TextTransparency = Alpha obj.TextStrokeTransparency = Alpha end end end ShieldUI.PlayerToHideFrom = Player local Center,Head = (Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Character:FindFirstChild("Torso")),Character:WaitForChild("Head") ShieldUI.Adornee = Center ShieldUI.Status.Text = ShieldHealth.Value.."/"..ShieldHealth.MaxValue ShieldUI.Parent = Center ShieldUI.Enabled = true
Connections[#Connections+1] = ShieldHealth.Changed:Connect(function() ShieldUI.Status.Text = ShieldHealth.Value.."/"..ShieldHealth.MaxValue end)
ModifyUITransparency(Head.Transparency) Connections[#Connections+1] = Head:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Transparency"):Connect(function() ModifyUITransparency(Head.Transparency) end)
Connections[#Connections+1] = EffectRemote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(client,ActionName) if client ~= Player then return end
wrap(function() Pcall(function() if EffectAction[ActionName].Ready then EffectAction[ActionName].Ready = false Delay(EffectAction[ActionName].Cooldown,function() EffectAction[ActionName].Ready = true end) EffectAction[ActionName].Function() end end) end)()
end)
Connections[#Connections+1] = Handle.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end
local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or FF or Hum == Humanoid then return end
if IsTeamMate(Player,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then return end
UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(Properties.Damage)
end)
end)()
end
function Unequipped()
ShieldUI.Adornee = nil ShieldUI.Enabled = false ShieldUI.Parent = nil
for i=1,#Deletables,1 do if Deletables[i] then Deletables[i]:Destroy() end end Deletables = {}
for i=1,#Connections,1 do if Connections[i] then Connections[i]:Disconnect() end end Connections = {}
end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
wrap(function() repeat Wait(Properties.ShieldRegenerationTime) ShieldHealth.Value = ShieldHealth.Value + Properties.ShieldRegenerationIncrement until not ShieldHealth end)()

--For Dragon Slayer's Sword & Shield --Makes an after-image effect when dashing
local Self = script
local Game = game
local Wait,Instant,Pairs,Type = wait,Instance.new,pairs,type
--local Mat = Enum.Material.Plastic
local Camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local SpawnRate = 1/30
local Character = Self:WaitForChild("Character").Value
local GetAllCharacterParts = Character.GetDescendants
local FindService,GetService = Game.FindService,Game.GetService local function ObtainService(ServiceName) return FindService(Game,ServiceName) or GetService(Game,ServiceName) end
local Services = { Players = ObtainService("Players"), Debris = ObtainService("Debris"), RunService = ObtainService("RunService") }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local DashModelBase = Create("Model"){ Name = "AfterImage", } while Character do
local DashModel = DashModelBase:Clone() Services.Debris:AddItem(DashModel,.5)
local Contents = GetAllCharacterParts(Character)
for i=1,#Contents,1 do
if Contents[i] and (Contents[i]:IsA("BasePart") --[[or Contents[i]:IsA("Humanoid") or Contents[i]:IsA("CharacterMesh") or Contents[i]:IsA("Clothing")]]) then
local Clone = Contents[i]:Clone()
if Clone:IsA("BasePart") then
Clone.Transparency = (Clone.Transparency >= 1 and 1 or .7) Clone.Anchored = true Clone.CanCollide = false Clone.Locked = true --Clone.Material = Mat
end
for _,v in Pairs(Clone:GetDescendants()) do if v and (v:IsA("BasePart") or v:IsA("BaseScript") or v:IsA("JointInstance") or v:IsA("Sound") or v:IsA("Light")) then v:Destroy() end end
Clone.Parent = DashModel
end
end DashModel.Parent = Camera DashModel:BreakJoints() Wait(SpawnRate) end

--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable --This script doesn't really initiate until the Motor6D has been sucessfully added
local Game = game
local FindService,GetService = Game.FindService,Game.GetService
local wrap,udim2,floor,Pairs,Tick,Instant,Type,Vec3,huge,Wait = coroutine.wrap,UDim2.new,math.floor,pairs,tick,Instance.new,type,Vector3.new,math.huge,wait
local function ObtainService(ServiceName) return FindService(Game,ServiceName) or GetService(Game,ServiceName) end
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Services = { RunService = ObtainService("RunService"), Players = ObtainService("Players"), Debris = ObtainService("Debris") }
local Self = script
local ShieldUI = Self:WaitForChild("ShieldUI"):Clone()
local Tool = Self.Parent
local Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer
local Character,Humanoid
local Animations = {}
local Connections = {}
local Ready = true local Activate,Deactivate
function Equipped()
Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local SoundRemote = Tool:FindFirstChild("PlayEffect")
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
Animations = Tool:WaitForChild("Animations"):WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name) Animations = { Equip = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild("Equip")), Idle = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild("Idle")), WindUp = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild("WindUp")), MultiSlash = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild("MultiSlash")), Slash = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild("Slash")) }
local RightLimb = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or Character:FindFirstChild("RightHand")
repeat Services.RunService.RenderStepped:Wait() until RightLimb:FindFirstChild("RightGrip_Motor") --Found it!
--print("Found the Motor!")
wrap(function()
local ProgressFrame,Status = ShieldUI:FindFirstChild("Progress",true),ShieldUI:FindFirstChild("Status",true)
local ShieldHealth = Tool:WaitForChild("ShieldHealth")
local function UpdateShieldInfo(CurrentHealth,MaxHealth)
ProgressFrame.Size = udim2(ProgressFrame.Size.X.Scale,ProgressFrame.Size.X.Offset,CurrentHealth/MaxHealth ,ProgressFrame.Size.Y.Offset) Status.Text = floor(CurrentHealth).."/"..floor(MaxHealth)
end
ShieldUI.Parent = Player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui") ShieldUI.Enabled = true UpdateShieldInfo(ShieldHealth.Value,ShieldHealth.MaxValue) Connections[#Connections+1] = ShieldHealth.Changed:Connect(function() UpdateShieldInfo(ShieldHealth.Value,ShieldHealth.MaxValue) end)
end)()
--Initiate Client Animations
Animations.Equip:Play(0,nil,3) Animations.Idle:Play() --Animations.Slash:Play() local WindUpTime = 0 if Activate then Activate:Disconnect();Activate=nil end if Deactivate then Deactivate:Disconnect();Deactivate=nil end Activate = Tool.Activated:Connect(function()
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Ready then return end
WindUpTime = Tick() Animations.WindUp:Play(.25,nil,3.5)
if Deactivate then Deactivate:Disconnect();Deactivate=nil end Deactivate = Tool.Deactivated:Connect(function() if Deactivate then Deactivate:Disconnect();Deactivate=nil end if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Ready then return end Ready = false Animations.WindUp:Stop(nil,nil,2)
if (Tick()-WindUpTime) >= .3 then
if SoundRemote then SoundRemote:FireServer("RapidSlash") end --print("Dashing")
Animations.MultiSlash:Play(nil,nil,4)
local Dash = Create("BodyVelocity"){ MaxForce = Vec3(1,1,1) * huge, Velocity = (Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Character:FindFirstChild("Torso")).CFrame.LookVector * 200, Parent = (Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Character:FindFirstChild("Torso")) } Services.Debris:AddItem(Dash,.1) Wait(.5) else Animations.Slash:Play(0,1,4) if SoundRemote then SoundRemote:FireServer("Slash") end end Ready = true
end)
end)
end
function Unequipped() if Activate then Activate:Disconnect();Activate = nil end if Deactivate then Deactivate:Disconnect();Deactivate = nil end for i=1,#Connections,1 do if Connections[i] then Connections[i]:Disconnect() end end Connections = {}
for _,anim in Pairs(Animations) do if anim then anim:Stop(.2,nil,1) end end
ShieldUI.Parent = nil
end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)

local Main = script.Parent local ScaleRep = script.Parent.Parent.Parent
ScaleRep:GetPropertyChangedSignal("AbsoluteSize"):Connect(function()
Main.Size = UDim2.new(0,ScaleRep.AbsoluteSize.X,0,ScaleRep.AbsoluteSize.Y+1)
end)
